title: Healthy Ep. 10 - The War for Your Faith with John Mark Comer
description:
The world, the flesh, the devil. What's really at stake? There is an all-out war for your faith and you need courage to fight. This is the conversation we all need to have about the lies we believe and how life with Jesus really is better.

Live No Lies is one of my top 5 books this year: https://www.amazon.com/Live-No-Lies-Recognize-Sabotage/dp/0525653120

Thanks to Away for supporting Made For This. Go to awaytravel.com/madeforthis to start your 100-day trial and shop the entire Away lineup of travel essentials – including their best-selling suitcases.
